document_data.name: Fireleap Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Fireleap Way''' was a long and straight street in [[Ravens Bluff]] that crossed the city almost completely, from east to west, beginning in the [[Ravens Bluff/Foreign District|Foreign District]] and ending in the [[Ravens Bluff/Tentowers|Tentowers]] neighborhood.
document_data.Geography: Fireleap Way's western end was located in the Foreign District, by the [[Coker Wharf Company]]'s docks. From there the street ran east, turning into [[Daren's Ring]] circle with the [[Ring Park]] in the middle, turning back into a straight line just before the gate out of the Foreign District. Next, Fireleap Way passed the moot with [[Westwall Way North]] and [[Fire Lane]], further east it crossed [[Raphiel Road]], [[Blacktree Boulevard North]], [[DeVillars Ride]], [[Manycoins Way]], the moot with [[Macintyre Path]] and [[Evensong Ride]], followed by crossings with [[O'Kane Court]], [[Waelstar Way]], and [[Lamorgyr's Ride]]. Then, Fireleap Way crossed [[DeVillars Creek]] via the [[Old Dragonbridge]], and continued on east past [[Torngel's Ride]], [[Stonekeep Concourse]], and finally ended on Bouldergrinder's Way.
document_data.Notable Locations:
*[[Embassy of Tantras (Ravens Bluff)|Embassy of Tantras]], just where Fireleap Way began and turned into Daren's Ring.
*[[Embassy of Thay (Ravens Bluff)|Embassy of Thay]], on the southern side of the street, across from the Embassy of Tantras.
*Home of [[Hark the Herald]], on Daren's Ring's southeast.
*[[Hangman's Courthouse]], a large plaza, south of where Westwall Way North and Fire Lane crossed Fireleap Way.
*[[Littleate & Sons]], a moneylender located on the crossing of Fireleap Way and Blacktree Boulevard North.
*[[Ondrel Spires]], a large luxury apartments complex located just past Littleate & Sons.
*[[The Stout Staff]], a vendor of canes, crutches, and [[pegleg]]s located on the crossing with Manycoins Way.
*[[Tower of Holy Revelry]], a temple dedicated to [[Lliira]], located across Fireleap Way from The Stout Staff.
*Home of [[Regora Ravensworth]], on the moot with Macintyre Path and Evensong Ride.
*[[Ravengard House]], the manse home of the [[Therogeon]] family, facing Lamorgyr's Ride.
*[[Stane Opera House]], across the street from the Ravengard House, facing Lamorgyr's Ride.
*[[House of the Rose]], a merchant house located on the crossing with Torngel's Ride.
*[[Gurneth's Goblet]] eatery on Bouldergrinder's Way.
